email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

We are looking to ship 50,000MT of iron ore from Tubarão to Qingdao. Could you provide a freight rate and vessel availability for this route?

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel OCEAN STAR for this shipment. The vessel has a DWT of 180,000 and an LOA of 290m. The laycan is from 2023-10-20 to 2023-10-25.

Our starting freight rate is USD 25.50 per MT on a CFR basis.

Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Sarah Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

Thank you for the quick response. The rate seems a bit high compared to current market conditions. Could you consider lowering the rate to USD 24.00 per MT?

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

We understand your concern. After reviewing the market conditions, we can offer a revised rate of USD 24.50 per MT. This rate is competitive and reflects the current market trends.

Please confirm if this works for you.

Best regards,
Sarah Lee

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah,

The revised rate of USD 24.50 per MT is acceptable. Please proceed with the booking. Could you also confirm the demurrage rate?

Best regards,
John Doe

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Iron Ore Shipment from Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi John,

Great to hear that! The demurrage rate is USD 20,000 per day. We will proceed with the booking and confirm the laycan as 2023-10-20 to 2023-10-25.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Sarah Lee
